adjective.description: (of a garment) fitting closely to the body and showing its shape.
examples: she was wearing a clinging black dress

phrases: If she is not this clinging vine, she is apt to rise superior to him, assert herself over him, and, after a while, humble him.
Mama wants to see me as a clinging vine being shielded by a big strong man, and you fit the bill.
Everyone knew this 27 year old actress was no clinging vine they could order around like a silly chorus girl.
